channel.title: Password Encrypting
channel.description:
My base is Sagi-Xevolution...
I want to make the files stop encrypting passwords, anyone help? How do I make the salt stop loading into the passwords and encrypting pass's.
Edit- If you don't want to spoon feed me.. 100% fine. At least tell me the file. That's all I need.

item.title: Password Encrypting
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Eh less try to help him decrypt, more teach him how lol. So what if he wants to, if he does, he can. Lol, i personally dont care, tho i dont like it much, people who play rsps take that risk.

Read full topic

item.title: Password Encrypting
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Why are you guys trying to help him crack his players passwords? I personally am against it and I hope that mod that checks this report is against it too…

Read full topic

item.title: Password Encrypting

item.description:
@I_Am_Sparc wrote:

I’ve found out it’s in playerSave.java,

However, I search encrypt and find just what I need. But I cannot do anything to it. If i even touch it, my compiler goes berserk.

Read full topic
